title: When I saw the new skins on PBE...
body:
Inquisitor {{champion:111}} and {{champion:15}} 
http://i.imgur.com/4ov4oLb.jpg http://i.imgur.com/yLesX8W.jpg
http://youtu.be/AAjz_ZFZsJ4 http://youtu.be/oY_qlHrobBg

Marauder {{champion:22}} and {{champion:19}} 
http://i.imgur.com/O6CtAYC.jpg http://i.imgur.com/D4LHoEu.jpg
http://youtu.be/V-FQ5aS9-Ao http://youtu.be/bK2X9Ykv_Cc

Wow. These skins are seriously amazing, I was excited for the Nautilus skin as soon as the splash art was leaked onto the PBE by mistake. However, I do have one small complaint (that's also not a complaint): the price.

Each of these skins will be 750 RP each. Sweet, I can get awesome skins for relatively cheap, BUT (here's where the complaint comes in), the price tag limits the skins in terms of what they can do. There are no special animations (esp. recall), no particle effects, etc. These have so much potential, and I'd gladly pay the 975 or 1350 RP for these skins.

replies.body:
I'm digging these fully-armored, full face masked skins they're putting out. I'm probably the only one who likes them, but I dig that stuff hard.

Here's to what I hope is the beginning of a new skin line!
I'm sure there are a lot of people who like them.It's just that people also want them to be 975 tier or higher skins,same thing happened with Sweetheart Annie.

I don't see the lower tier as a bad thing. Riot did say they were gonna probably release a lot more for that tier afterall. Sure it limits some of the things we see in the skins but they are still nice overall and come with a great look for the tier.

Hey,cheaper is always better.It's just that some people want more from the skins they buy.

Me?I just buy most skins based on the splash art :3.

Careful man. Following that train may cause you to be disappointed when the model doesn't even look good. Though I understand that the art gives good impressions. Just saying, put some value in the model when looking for a skin.
You're not the only one. My favourite skins are of that type, with full body armour and masks. Finally something that looks like it's for battle!
I don't think you're the only one that likes them, personally I like them a lot and they have a Dark Souls/Elder Scrolls feel to them (Daedric pls)
So if Naut is 750, will his anchor particle not match the anchor he's carrying then?

> [{quoted}](name=Centuros,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=W0he6l9e,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-28T02:21:23.207+0000)
>
> So if Naut is 750, will his anchor particle not match the anchor he's carrying then?

They're both models, and they'll be matching. :]
Is it possible to simply change ashe's arrow color to red? doesnt need new fancy particles, just not blue. The blue is ok i guess but red would be so much better :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=W0he6l9e,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-28T02:57:54.969+0000)
>
> They're both models, and they'll be matching. :]

Please at least change the ults particles to silverish.  The green just... doesn't fit.
The greenish-white default particles are just fine with me. They don't stick out that much on Inquisitor Naut.

> [{quoted}](name=Dragonzzilla,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=W0he6l9e,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T05:53:03.017+0000)
>
> The greenish-white default particles are just fine with me. They don't stick out that much on Inquisitor Naut.

Play at max settings.  It'll stick out like a sore thumb.

Personally I think just reusing the astronaut particles would be sufficient; if the skin is actually 'nautical' themed, I think the earthy-textured particles are probably a better direction to head in. I do love this new skin though. And the Sivir one. I'm probably gonna gift it to a mate so we can duo bot lane with it.
It would be cool if they added the Astronautilus particles, the current ones don't really fit with the color scheme of the skin. Plus the space particles are awesome

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=W0he6l9e,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-28T02:57:54.969+0000)
>
> They're both models, and they'll be matching. :]

To bad they wont change the particle effects that would've been cool, but Nautilus reminds me of a Knight from White Knight Chronicles or something that involves giant bulky paladin knight people
The anchor matches

Fully agree, I would pay more in a heartbeat for some particle effects etc to complete the skins. Though I will say I'll still be happy if it doesn't happen considering I almost cried with joy at finally seeing a badass ashe skin, THANK YOU RIOT! Took forever but you finally gave ashe a strong skin worthy of her badassery :D

When I saw these skins my mind immediately shot to Diablo. Ashe reminds me of the look of the best gear set for the Demon Hunter, and it's called *Marauder* for God's sake, so if it's a coincidence, it's a really, *really* odd coincidence. That, and the Inquisitors look like the Angels from D3, given the main color of silver with gold and blue highlights with the face obscured by shadow.
Ashe looks like a Daedra to me.

I think the concept is solid, I like the cheaper price than normal, and the only thing I think they're missing is a different death animation where they fall apart and it's revealed that they were just empty armor shells all along. 

Because that was my first reaction to the leaked splash art and I think that it would be cool.
A recall animation would be cool, especially since they don't have recall animations on their normal skins (at least I'm pretty sure)
The skins remind me of Kingdom Hearts where the Keyblade Masters had armor. It was all mysterious in KH2 when we thought these warriors were from the future or something :P
Yeah honestly if they took more time and made them better, I would not a single problem with the price
It would be nice if their colours could be enhanced a bit, so that yellow, silver and red could pop out more. They currently look a bit dull don't they?
Damn.
Ah yes, why can't every skin be a legendary skin.
lol that blatant copyright infringement on ashe's bow. riot pls. i hope bethesda doesn't rip you a new asshole.
The Ashe skin is really strange. It feels like a completely different character.
